overview: If you think you've seen it all when it comes to extreme sports, think again. In the helmet-cam footage captured here, you'll feel all of the pleasure and pain these daredevil athletes experience in their high-flying maneuvers. From the ski slopes to the water's edge, these snowboarders, wakeboarders, cyclists, surfers, skaters and more share their most off-the-charts adventures.
title: Seriously Nuts: Red Label
